title: Evolution Risk-Aware Scheduler
reason: We need this skill because agents stagnate without structured reflection and continuous improvement loops. This specific skill times execution based on risk posture instead of urgency alone.
implementationGuide: Define the scope and success metrics for `Evolution Risk-Aware Scheduler`, including at least three measurable KPIs tied to capability stagnation and repeated blind spots.
Design and version the input/output contract for outcomes, error taxonomies, and adaptation decisions, then add schema validation and failure-mode handling.
Implement the core capability using risk-weighted sequencing, and produce risk-gated schedules with deterministic scoring.
Integrate the skill into swarm orchestration: task routing, approval gates, retry strategy, and rollback controls.
Add unit, integration, and simulation tests that explicitly cover capability stagnation and repeated blind spots, then run regression baselines.
Deploy behind a feature flag, monitor telemetry/alerts for two release cycles, and iterate thresholds based on observed outcomes.
